name: Section
description: The Section component is a visual helper.

props.name: variant
props.doc: Defines the semantic purpose and subsequently the style of the visual helper. Will take precedence over the style_type property.

props.name: breakout
props.doc: Use `true` to enable a fullscreen breakout look. Supports also media query breakpoints like `{ small: boolean }`. Defaults to `true`.

props.name: outset
props.doc: Define if the Card should break out negatively on larger screens. You cannot use `breakout` and `outset` together. Defaults to `false`.

props.name: outline
props.doc: Define a custom border color. If `true` is given, `color-black-8` is used. Use a Eufemia color. Supports also media query breakpoints like `{ small: 'black-8' }`.

props.name: outlineWidth
props.doc: Define a custom border width. Defaults to `var(--card-outline-width)`. Supports also media query breakpoints like `{ small: '2px' }`.

props.name: roundedCorner
props.doc: Use `true` to enable rounded corners (border-radius). Supports also media query breakpoints like `{ small: boolean }`. Defaults to `false`.

props.name: backgroundColor
props.doc: Define a custom background color, instead of a variant. Use a Eufemia color. Supports also media query breakpoints like `{ small: 'white' }`.

props.name: dropShadow
props.doc: Use `true` to show the default Eufemia DropShadow. Supports also media query breakpoints like `{ small: true }`.

props.name: textColor
props.doc: Define a custom text color to compliment the backgroundColor. Use a Eufemia color. Supports also media query breakpoints like `{ small: 'black-80' }`.

props.name: innerSpace
props.doc: Will add a padding around the content. Supports also media query breakpoints like `{small: { top: 'medium' }}`.

props.name: innerRef
props.doc: By providing a React Ref we can get the internally used element (DOM). E.g. `inner_ref={myRef}` by using `React.createRef()` or `React.useRef()`.

props.name: info
props.doc: Neutral, informational.

props.name: error
props.doc: Indicates an erroneous state.

props.name: warning
props.doc: Draws attention to a potential problem that may or may not require an action on the user's part.

props.name: success
props.doc: Indicates a successful state.

props.name: white
props.doc: uses `--color-white`.

props.name: divider
props.doc: uses `--color-white` as background with a border-line on top and bottom.

props.name: transparent
props.doc: CSS transparent. Used in situations where a Section is of interest, but without a color as a basis.

props.name: mint-green-12
props.doc: (default) uses `--color-mint-green-12`.

props.name: mint-green
props.doc: uses `--color-mint-green`.

props.name: lavender
props.doc: uses `--color-lavender`.

props.name: sand-yellow
props.doc: uses `--color-sand-yellow`.

props.name: pistachio
props.doc: uses `--color-pistachio`.

props.name: black-3
props.doc: uses `--color-black-3`.

props.name: emerald-green
props.doc: uses `--color-emerald-green`.

props.name: fire-red
props.doc: uses `--color-fire-red`. Is used by GlobalStatus
